results.title: Anti-inflammatory, Antioxidant, and Antiapoptotic Action of Metformin Attenuates Ethanol Neurotoxicity in the Animal Model of Fetal Alcohol Spectrum Disorders.
results.text_hl: Anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@, Antioxidant, and Antiapoptotic Action of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ Attenuates @CHEMICAL_Ethanol @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000431 @@@Ethanol@@@ @DISEASE_Neurotoxicity_Syndromes @DISEASE_MESH:D020258 @@@Neurotoxicity@@@ in the Animal Model of Fetal @<m>DISEASE_Fetal_Alcohol_Spectrum_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D063647 @@@Alcohol Spectrum Disorders@@@.

results.title: Hippocampus-dependent memory and allele-specific gene expression in adult offspring of alcohol-consuming dams after neonatal treatment with thyroxin or metformin
results.text_hl: These future explorations will provide further confirmation for the translational value of @CHEMICAL_Thyroxine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013974 @@@T4@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Fetal_Alcohol_Spectrum_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D063647 @@@FASD@@@.

results.title: Neuroprotective effect of osmotin against ethanol-induced apoptotic neurodegeneration in the developing rat brain
results.text_hl: Modulation of @GENE_PRKAA2 @GENE_78975 @@@AMPK@@@ pathways by @GENE_LOC107787819 @GENE_107787819 @@@osmotin@@@, @GENE_ADIPOQ @GENE_246253 @@@adiponectin@@@, and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ hold promise as a preventive therapy for @<m>DISEASE_Fetal_Alcohol_Spectrum_Disorders</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D063647 @@@fetal alcohol syndrome@@@.
